game.name: Fun with Ragdolls Plus
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, 레벨 에디터 포함, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Embark on an epic and fun platforming adventure with ragdoll physics. Create worlds and stories or follow Danny and Rickie's journey through the world of ragdolls, uncovering the dark truth it holds.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Embark on an epic and fun platforming adventure with ragdoll physics. Create worlds and stories or follow Danny and Rickie's journey through the world of ragdolls, uncovering the dark truth it holds.
